author: pdobacz
content: Hi! Anyone knows what is the issue with CI for `execution-spec-tests`? https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/commits/main/ It started failing after merge of my PR, but the error seems unrelated, and also the CI passed on the PR itself.

author: marioevz
content: One library import started failing but we have a PR now: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/637

author: __flcl
content: <@393119312350543872> hello! BlockchainTests/Pyspecs were removed months ago, are those ones where duplicates of some tests or like that?

author: dimitry8570
content:
Now all pyspecs are in GeneralStateTestsFiller/Pyspecs

Because it fills into state tests and into blockchain tests.

However there are also tests in pyspecs that fill only into blockchain format, so you shouldn't ignore `BlockchainTests/GeneralStateTests/Pyspecs`

author: dimitry8570
content: Maybe it should be a separate folder for more clarity
